name: scrappy-linkedin
excerpt: Bot that searches LinkedIn for relevant job postings, filters out irrelevant ones, and sends job details via Telegram.
description:
A Python website-crawling bot that looks for job postings on LinkedIn and sends you Telegram messages with job openings. Built using Python, pyTelegramBotAPI and Selenium v4.27.1. It simulates human-like browsing behavior to prevent bot detection from LinkedIn and to also not overload their servers with requests.


Features

  • Scrapes job postings from LinkedIn.
  • Sends you Telegram messages with job details after scraping is finished.
  • Filters out irrelevant job titles, job postings that aren't in the correct language, and jobs that require too much experience.

Usage

The bot will scrape job listings based on the configurations you've set (e.g., company websites, keywords, etc.). When it finishes scraping, it will send you Telegram messages with the job details.
